verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:7
verses.text: And David said to Abiathar the priest, Ahimelech’s son, I pray thee, bring me hither the ephod. And Abiathar brought thither the ephod to David.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:8
verses.text: And David enquired at the Lord, saying, Shall I pursue after this troop? shall I overtake them? And he answered him, Pursue: for thou shalt surely overtake them, and without fail recover all.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:9
verses.text: So David went, he and the six hundred men that were with him, and came to the brook Besor, where those that were left behind stayed.
